thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 12 of 61
thread.title: CHRISTOPHER PISCIOTTA

author: CHRISTOPHER PISCIOTTA
title: CHRISTOPHER PISCIOTTA
text:
Hi,
I am so happy to get this review. I hated my experience with this web sight! I would not shop on here if it was the last retailer on earth. Between having orders cancelled a number of times, you have lost significant sales because of this, to receiving 3 of the same orders, and having to take my time out to return them, to receiving items I did not order and then told in a rude abrupt manner, I was stuck with them. I don't know how this web sight stays in business.
As a consumer, and a fellow human being, I am shocked at the behavior, especially in these economic times.
Thank you for listening,
Christopher Pisciotta
